## TileDataSource.decoder property

Get the \[\[ITileDecoder\]\] of this `ITileDataSource`<!-- -->, which has either been passed in with the options, or has been supplied by the \[\[ConcurrentDecoderFacade\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get decoder(): ITileDecoder;
```
